nodes.text: Kemp Remillard is a senior concept artist working for Massive Black Inc., a digital art and illustration studio in San Francisco.

Remillard is best known for his concept work for Hasbro properties including G.I.Joe and Transformers, the tanks in Red Faction: Guerrilla, the dropship in Killzone 2, some of the tanks in EVE: DUST 514, the 300i in Star Citizen, and for editing and directing Massive Black: Vol 1 & 2.

In 2015, Remillard illustrated the entirety of Star Wars: The Force Awakens: Incredible Cross-Sections and described it as one of the coolest projects he has worked on. In 2016, Remillard illustrated Star Wars: Complete Locations, the canon re-issue of the 2005 reference book of the same name.
